snippet: Bounce Ballroom in Brooklyn, part of the Red Bull Music Academy festival, blurred the lines between professional and amateur, while recalling an illicit rave.
abstract: Jon Caramanica reviews Bounce Ballroom, dance party featuring four styles of dance music, at Brooklyn Night Bazaar as part of Red Bull Music Academy festival.
lead_paragraph: Bounce Ballroom in Brooklyn, part of the Red Bull Music Academy festival, blurred the lines between professional and amateur, while recalling an illicit rave.

headline.print_headline: Vying for Bragging Rights, Prancing Pros and Amateurs
headline.seo: Moving to Varied Beats at Bounce Ballroom
headline.main: Vying for Bragging Rights, Prancing Pros and Amateurs
